page.title: 02THE CHURCH
page.content: In many villages,the importance of the {church}has rapidly deteriorated.We are pleased to say that this is not the case in Whitbourne.The church still plays a{very important}part in the life of this village.Young and old alike go to church in order to worship and enjoy the many services provided.The church is a{meeting place for people as well as being an old and {beautiful building}to look at.The church and the school have strong links.The Rector comes into school regularly to take assemblies and teach us about Jesus.We use the church for our{school services}at various times of the year.Many of the children are in the{choir}and there is also a group of people who learn the art of{bell_ {ringing.}The church is a place for worship but it's influence is recognised all through the village.
